scripts.seed:production: npm run seed:generate && npx sanity dataset import ./src/sanity/seed.ndjson production
scripts.seed:dev: npm run seed:generate && npx sanity dataset import ./src/sanity/seed.ndjson development
scripts.clean-data:production: npx sanity dataset delete production --force && npx sanity dataset create production --visibility public
scripts.clean-data:dev: npx sanity dataset delete development --force && npx sanity dataset create development --visibility public
scripts.typegen: sanity schema extract --path=./src/sanity/extract.json && sanity typegen generate
scripts.sanity:promote: npx sanity@latest dataset export development sanity-dev-export.tar.gz && npx sanity@latest dataset import sanity-dev-export.tar.gz production --replace && node -e "try { require('fs').unlinkSync('sanity-dev-export.tar.gz'); } catch (e) {}"
